name: Gplx
description: What is the project about? GPLX is a decentralized spot and perpetual exchange on Pulsechain that supports low swap fees and zero price impact trades. What makes your project unique? First GMX fork on the Pulsechain blockchain. History of your project. Following the creation of a v1, an internal developer betrayed us. So we're back after a period of intense development to return to the forefront of the blockchain Pulsechain being the first functional GMX fork. We've created a Manga explaining the journey of our project which makes it unique since the birth of blockchain. Available below: Part 1. https://twitter.com/Gplx_io/status/1693675300599586995 Part 2. https://twitter.com/Gplx_io/status/1694037760800125425 Part 3. https://twitter.com/Gplx_io/status/1694830231679324349 Whatâ€™s next for your project? Implement GMX updates on our v2 application. What can your token be used for? The low-quantity token enables staking to obtain Escrowed GPLX, which in turn can be stacked for vesting. An anti-dumping mechanism and performance utility verifiable on our website.
